title: PHPUnit errors, for instance from invalid data providers, are not reported correctly
body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version     | 10.2.6
| PHP version         | 8.2.5
| Installation Method | Composer

#### Summary
PHPUnit display OK even when having a PHPUnit error due to an invalid data provider.

The PHPUnit error is displayed, the return is `2` but the green OK is displayed.

Note : I tested with phpunit `9.6.10` and tests were considered KO (and displayed red).

Here is the phpunit output

```console
$ vendor/bin/phpunit  --configuration phpunit.xml

PHPUnit 10.2.6 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:       PHP 8.2.5
Configuration: /var/www/app/phpunit.xml

.                                                                   1 / 1 (100%)

Time: 00:00.002, Memory: 8.00 MB

There was 1 PHPUnit error:

1) DumbTest::testWithErrorInDataProvider
The data provider specified for DumbTest::testWithErrorInDataProvider is invalid
Call to a member function bar() on array

/var/www/app/tests/DumbTest.php:14

OK (1 test, 1 assertion)
$ echo $?
2
```


#### How to reproduce

Here and example of how to reproduce (calling a method on an array in the data provider method, my initial error was a type hinting error).

```php
class DumbTest extends TestCase
{
    /**
     * @dataProvider providerWithErrorInDataProvider
     */
    public function testWithErrorInDataProvider(string $string): void
    {
        Assert::assertNull(null);
    }

    public static function providerWithErrorInDataProvider(): array
    {
        $foo = [];
        $foo->bar();

        return [ ['hello world'] ];
    }

    public function testTrue(): void
    {
        Assert::assertTrue(true);
    }
}
```

`phpunit.xml`
```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phpunit xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="https://schema.phpunit.de/10.2/phpunit.xsd"
         bootstrap="vendor/autoload.php"
         cacheDirectory=".phpunit.cache"
         colors="true"
         executionOrder="depends,defects"
         requireCoverageMetadata="false"
         beStrictAboutCoverageMetadata="true"
         beStrictAboutOutputDuringTests="true"
         failOnWarning="true"
         failOnRisky="true"
         failOnDeprecation="true"
         failOnNotice="true"
         failOnSkipped="true"
         failOnIncomplete="true">
    <testsuites>
        <testsuite name="default">
            <directory>tests/</directory>
        </testsuite>
    </testsuites>

    <source restrictDeprecations="true" restrictNotices="true" restrictWarnings="true">
        <include>
            <directory>src</directory>
        </include>
    </source>
</phpunit>
```
`composer.json`
```json
{
    "require": {
        "php": "^8.2"
    },
    "require-dev": {
        "phpunit/phpunit": "^10.2"
    },
    "autoload": {
        "psr-4": {
            "Lebris\\": "src/",
            "Lebris\\Tests\\": "tests/"
        }
    }
}
```
